document_data.name: Hilrad
document_data.mainbody: '''Hilrad''', nicknamed '''The Patient''', was a skilled [[human]] [[wizard]] and nature lover inhabiting [[Elventree]] around [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Hilrad was an amateur [[sage]] who welcomed newcomers to Elventree, listening to their endless questions with patience. He was a useful guide to Elventree. Hilrad did not have any apprentices, nor did he sell [[spell]]s, but he was known to swap spells with friendly travelers on occasion.
